txt.en: Your continued efforts to aid the Kintai Elves brings great joy to them. You should visit Thridarlan at Shonith to receive a gift from the Elves of the oasis.
Reach Kindred tier with the Adúrhid
Your continued assistance with the goals and objective of the Kintai Elves earns you merit among them. They wish to honour your efforts with a gift at Shonith.

'We are beyond calling you friend or ally. Were you of our blood we would call you family.\n\n'Thank you for all you have done for the Adúrhid. Please, know this gift is given with the greatest grace we can call upon.'
Your standing with the Adúrhid improves and earns you a gift from the Ikorbâni Elves.

'Were this another era this would perhaps be less melancholy. It is with great humility we thank you.

'While we share a long departed heritage, we know the slight our people made against us all. It is nice to know there is still merit to our existence.

'You have proven we may yet be forgiven for our transgress.'
Your continued assistance with the goals and objective of the Kintai Elves earns you merit among them. They wish to honour your efforts with a gift at Shonith.
Visit Thridarlan at Shonith to receive a gift
